Been A While, {{ customer.first_name }}

Your Ford has been with you through countless adventures, and we’re proud to have been part of your journey. Let’s take a moment to reflect on the milestones we’ve achieved together.

 

Our History Together

Remembering these times:

{# Co2 emission saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a53'] }}

years since your 1st Ford

{# Liters saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a59'] }}

miles traveled together

 

But We Are Not Finished

Remember that feeling of finding the thing you were looking for? That sense of discovery and delight? Since you got your {# Favorite category #}{{ segmentations['67869989cc3dd4608953b7f4'] }}  {{ snippet('679570c15e046168bc232ab7', {}) }}{# PARAMS_START {'id':'679570c15e046168bc232ab7','values':{}} PARAMS_END #}  ago, we continued working on our legacy of delivering innovative, high-quality vehicles. We made sure every new model is designed with sustainability, efficiency, and cutting-edge technology in mind

 

What You May Be Missing

Welcome Back, {{ customer.first_name }}

We’ve noticed you’ve been driving less lately, and we want to remind you of the incredible potential your Ford vehicle holds. Together, we’ve made strides toward smarter, more sustainable mobility—let’s keep that momentum going.

 

Your Impact So Far

Here’s what we’ve achieved together:

{# Co2 emission saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a53'] }}

gr of CO2 emissions saved

{# Liters saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a59'] }}

miles driven sustainably

 

But We Are Not Finished

Your favorite {# Favorite category #}{{ segmentations['67869989cc3dd4608953b7f4'] }} has inspired a new collection.

Since you got your {# Favorite category #}{{ segmentations['67869989cc3dd4608953b7f4'] }} {{ snippet('679570c15e046168bc232ab7', {}) }}{# PARAMS_START {'id':'679570c15e046168bc232ab7','values':{}} PARAMS_END #} ago, we continued working on our legacy of delivering innovative, high-quality vehicles. We made sure every new model is designed with sustainability, efficiency, and cutting-edge technology in mind

 

Curated For Your Ongoing Journey

The Ford community is stronger than ever, and we’re thrilled to have you as part of it. Together, we’re redefining what it means to drive smart and sustainably.

 

Our Community

Welcome Back, {{ customer.first_name }}

We’ve noticed you’ve been driving less lately, and we want to remind you of the incredible potential your Ford vehicle holds. Together, we’ve made strides toward smarter, more sustainable mobility—let’s keep that momentum going.

 

Your Impact So Far

Here’s what we’ve achieved together:

{# Co2 emission saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a53'] }}

#email_data1#

{# Liters saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a59'] }}

#email_data2#

 

But We Are Not Finished

Your favorite {# Favorite category #}{{ segmentations['67869989cc3dd4608953b7f4'] }} has inspired a new collection.

Since you got your {# Favorite category #}{{ segmentations['67869989cc3dd4608953b7f4'] }} {{ snippet('679570c15e046168bc232ab7', {}) }}{# PARAMS_START {'id':'679570c15e046168bc232ab7','values':{}} PARAMS_END #} ago, we continued working on our legacy of delivering innovative, high-quality vehicles. We made sure every new model is designed with sustainability, efficiency, and cutting-edge technology in mind

 

Curated For Your Ongoing Journey

Welcome Back, {{ customer.first_name }}

We’ve noticed you’ve been driving less lately, and we want to remind you of the incredible potential your Ford vehicle holds. Together, we’ve made strides toward smarter, more sustainable mobility—let’s keep that momentum going.

 

Your Impact So Far

Here’s what we’ve achieved together:

{# Co2 emission saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a53'] }}

gr of CO2 emissions saved

{# Liters saved #}{{ expressions['679570c05e046168bc232a59'] }}

miles driven sustainably

 

But We Are Not Finished

Remember that feeling of finding the thing you were looking for? That sense of discovery and delight? Since you got your {# Favorite category #}{{ segmentations['67869989cc3dd4608953b7f4'] }}   {{ snippet('679570c15e046168bc232ab7', {}) }}{# PARAMS_START {'id':'679570c15e046168bc232ab7','values':{}} PARAMS_END #}   ago, we continued working on our legacy of delivering innovative, high-quality vehicles. We made sure every new model is designed with sustainability, efficiency, and cutting-edge technology in mind

 

Curated For Your Ongoing Journey

params.1question: What is your primary reason for considering a Ford vehicle?
params.1questionAnswers: 🚗 Daily commuting;🏁 Performance driving;🌍 Eco-friendly choice;👨‍👩‍👧 Family safety
params.2question: Which Ford feature excites you the most?
params.2questionAnswers: ⚡ Electric powertrain;🛡️ Advanced safety;📱 Smart tech;🎨 Sleek design
params.3question: How often do you drive long distances?
params.4question: How do you prefer to hear more about what we can offer you?
params.4questionAnswers: 📧 Email updates;📱 Mobile alerts;💬 SMS;📸 Instagram;🌐 Website
params.5question: If there is a new release or discount, how would you like to be contacted?
params.6question: Would you be interested in delivery subscription service?
params.7question: Which product category are you most interested in exploring?
params.7questionAnswers: Fresh produce 🥬; International foods 🌍; Organic options 🌿; Ready-to-eat meals 🥡; Baking supplies 🥖
params.8question: Would you recommend our brand to your friends & family?
